verses.verse: Then all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> themselves to <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H6106>"Behold,<s%> we are your bone and your <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

In <S%H8543>times<s%> <S%H8032>past,<s%> even when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H4428>king,<s%> it was you who led <S%H3318>out<s%> and brought <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7462>you,<s%> 'You shall be shepherd of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and you shall be <S%H5057>prince<s%> over my <S%H1571>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>'"

So all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them in <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and they <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> (the same is <S%H2982>Jebus<s%>); and the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> were there.

The <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2982>Jebus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> "You shall not <S%H935>come<s%> in <S%H1732>here.<s%>" Nevertheless David <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H4686>stronghold<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion.<s%> The same is the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Whoever <S%H5221>strikes<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%> shall be <S%H7218>chief<s%> and <S%H8269>captain.<s%>" <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H7223>first,<s%> and was made <S%H7218>chief.<s%>
<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H4679>stronghold;<s%> therefore they <S%H7121>called<s%> it the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>

He <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%> from <S%H4407>Millo<s%> even <S%H5439>around;<s%> and <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H2421>repaired<s%> the <S%H7605>rest<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3212>grew<s%> <S%H1980>greater<s%> and <S%H1980>greater;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of Armies was with <S%H6635>him.<s%>

Now these are the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> whom <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2388>had,<s%> who showed themselves strong with him in his <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> together with all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to make him <S%H4427>king,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> concerning <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

This is the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> whom <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3434>had:<s%> Jashobeam, the son of a <S%H2453>Hachmonite,<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7991>thirty;<s%> he lifted <S%H5782>up<s%> his <S%H2595>spear<s%> against <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2491>killed<s%> them at <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6471>time.<s%>
<S%H310>After<s%> him was <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1734>Dodo,<s%> the <S%H266>Ahohite,<s%> who was one of the <S%H7969>three<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men.<s%>

He was with <S%H1732>David<s%> at <S%H6450>Pasdammim,<s%> and there the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were gathered <S%H622>together<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> where there was a <S%H2513>plot<s%> of <S%H7704>ground<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H8184>barley;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

They <S%H3320>stood<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H2513>plot,<s%> and <S%H5337>defended<s%> <S%H5221>it,<s%> and killed the <S%H6430>Philistines;<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5337>saved<s%> them by a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8668>victory.<s%>

<S%H7969>Three<s%> of the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> men went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H6697>rock<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> into the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of <S%H5725>Adullam;<s%> and the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%>
<S%H1732>David<s%> was then in the <S%H4686>stronghold,<s%> and the <S%H5333>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> was then in <S%H1035>Bethlehem.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H183>longed,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Oh that one would give me <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> of the <S%H953>well<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%> which is by the <S%H8179>gate!<s%>"

The <S%H7969>three<s%> broke <S%H1234>through<s%> the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H7579>drew<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> out of the <S%H953>well<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%> that was by the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> <S%H935>it,<s%> and brought it to <S%H1732>David:<s%> but <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8354>drink<s%> of <S%H5258>it,<s%> but poured it out to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%>

and <S%H559>said,<s%> "My <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2486>forbid<s%> it <S%H6213>me,<s%> that I should do <S%H2063>this!<s%> Shall I <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of these <S%H582>men<s%> who have put their lives in <S%H5315>jeopardy?<s%>" For they risked their <S%H5315>lives<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H14>it.<s%> Therefore he would not <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H7969>it.<s%> The three <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men did these <S%H6213>things.<s%>

<S%H52>Abishai,<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> he was <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7969>three;<s%> for he lifted <S%H5782>up<s%> his <S%H2595>spear<s%> against <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2491>killed<s%> <S%H8034>them,<s%> and had a name among the <S%H7969>three.<s%>
Of the <S%H7969>three,<s%> he was more <S%H3513>honorable<s%> than the <S%H8147>two,<s%> and was made their <S%H8269>captain:<s%> however he <S%H935>didn't<s%> attain to the <S%H7969>three.<s%>

<S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H6909>Kabzeel,<s%> who had done <S%H7227>mighty<s%> <S%H6467>deeds,<s%> he <S%H5221>killed<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H739>sons<s%> of Ariel of <S%H4124>Moab:<s%> he went <S%H3381>down<s%> also and <S%H5221>killed<s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H8432>in<s%> the midst of a <S%H953>pit<s%> in <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H7950>snow.<s%>

He <S%H5221>killed<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of great <S%H4060>stature,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H4713>high;<s%> and in the Egyptian's <S%H3027>hand<s%> was a <S%H2595>spear<s%> like a <S%H707>weaver<s%>'s <S%H4500>beam;<s%> and he went <S%H3381>down<s%> to him with a <S%H7626>staff,<s%> and <S%H1497>plucked<s%> the <S%H2595>spear<s%> out of the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> him with his own <S%H2595>spear.<s%>
<S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> these <S%H8034>things,<s%> and had a name among the <S%H7969>three<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> he was more <S%H3513>honorable<s%> than the <S%H7970>thirty,<s%> but he <S%H935>didn't<s%> attain to the <S%H7969>three:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> him over his <S%H4928>guard.<s%>

Also the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of the <S%H2428>armies:<s%> <S%H6214>Asahel<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> <S%H445>Elhanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1734>Dodo<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%>
<S%H8054>Shammoth<s%> the <S%H2033>Harorite,<s%> <S%H2503>Helez<s%> the <S%H6397>Pelonite,<s%>
<S%H5896>Ira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6142>Ikkesh<s%> the <S%H8621>Tekoite,<s%> <S%H44>Abiezer<s%> the <S%H6069>Anathothite,<s%>
<S%H5444>Sibbecai<s%> the <S%H2843>Hushathite,<s%> <S%H5866>Ilai<s%> the <S%H266>Ahohite,<s%>
<S%H4121>Maharai<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite,<s%> <S%H2466>Heled<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1196>Baanah<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite,<s%>
<S%H863>Ithai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7380>Ribai<s%> of <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H6553>Pirathonite,<s%>
<S%H2360>Hurai<s%> of the <S%H5158>brooks<s%> of <S%H1608>Gaash,<s%> <S%H22>Abiel<s%> the <S%H6164>Arbathite,<s%>
<S%H5820>Azmaveth<s%> the <S%H978>Baharumite,<s%> <S%H455>Eliahba<s%> the <S%H8170>Shaalbonite,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2044>Hashem<s%> the <S%H1493>Gizonite,<s%> <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7681>Shagee<s%> the <S%H2043>Hararite,<s%>
<S%H279>Ahiam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7940>Sacar<s%> the <S%H2043>Hararite,<s%> <S%H465>Eliphal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H218>Ur,<s%>
<S%H2660>Hepher<s%> the <S%H4382>Mecherathite,<s%> <S%H281>Ahijah<s%> the <S%H6397>Pelonite,<s%>
<S%H2695>Hezro<s%> the <S%H3761>Carmelite,<s%> <S%H5293>Naarai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H229>Ezbai,<s%>
<S%H3100>Joel<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> <S%H4006>Mibhar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1905>Hagri,<s%>
<S%H6768>Zelek<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite,<s%> <S%H5171>Naharai<s%> the <S%H1307>Berothite,<s%> the armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah,<s%>
<S%H5896>Ira<s%> the <S%H3505>Ithrite,<s%> <S%H1619>Gareb<s%> the <S%H3505>Ithrite,<s%>
<S%H223>Uriah<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> <S%H2066>Zabad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H304>Ahlai,<s%>
<S%H5721>Adina<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7877>Shiza<s%> the <S%H7206>Reubenite,<s%> a <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> and thirty with <S%H7970>him,<s%>
<S%H2605>Hanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4601>Maacah,<s%> and <S%H3146>Joshaphat<s%> the <S%H4981>Mithnite,<s%>
<S%H5814>Uzzia<s%> the <S%H6254>Ashterathite,<s%> <S%H8091>Shama<s%> and <S%H3273>Jeiel<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2369>Hotham<s%> the <S%H6200>Aroerite,<s%>
<S%H3043>Jediael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8113>Shimri,<s%> and <S%H3109>Joha<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> the <S%H8491>Tizite,<s%>
<S%H447>Eliel<s%> the <S%H4233>Mahavite,<s%> and <S%H3403>Jeribai,<s%> and <S%H3145>Joshaviah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H493>Elnaam,<s%> and <S%H3495>Ithmah<s%> the <S%H4125>Moabite,<s%>
<S%H447>Eliel,<s%> and <S%H5744>Obed,<s%> and <S%H3300>Jaasiel<s%> the <S%H4677>Mezobaite.<s%>
